boardgame.name: Storm over Arnhem
boardgame.description: This is the first of the Area-Impulse games done by Avalon Hill which later included Thunder at Cassino, Turning Point: Stalingrad and Breakout Normandy. The game simulates the ferocious battle for the Arnhem Bridge on September 18-21, 1944._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game begins with the British holding the area around the bridge, surrounded by the Germans. They try to hold out for as long as they can._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each full turn covers 8 hours and includes many mini-turns (or impulses). Each impulse, the player can move or fire a small number units. Once moved or fired, the units are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;committed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and cannot move or fire again until the next turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Combat is handled by calculating attack and defense values with each side adding the roll of 2 dice. The difference (if the attacker has the higher total) in final point values is the number of casualty points the defender must lose by retreating or destroying units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The games is of relatively low complexity for a wargame and rates 3 (out of 10) on AH's difficulty scale._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1982 Charles S. Roberts Best Twentieth Century Game Nominee

listing.notes: Played 3-4 times. All game pieces present.

This is the folio edition of Storm Over Arnhem. Pieces have been punched, but the game is complete. All pieces have been neatly bagged. Only played a few times and everything is in very nice condition.

Game complete with rules, dice, boards, dice, and counters. Counters punched and sorted in polybags. Box shows some wear but colours crisp and not faded. The top of the upper lid has a small (1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; or 10 mm) crease on its edge.

Now this condition would be Very Good or even Like New except for one thing. The game is 95% unpunched. However, of the 5% that is punched, three or four counters are missing! The previous owner made up at least one replacement counter, but you would need to make a couple more. The counter sheets scans are available online, so this really shouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be too much of a problem. Pictures available upon request.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. STORM OVER ARNHEM FOLIO EDITION: $49.95 Avalon Hill (1981) * Game is unpunched and unplayed -- see pictures below SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Folio Edition, with unmounted map, 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (not 3/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) counters and a 34-page history of the battle (part of the rulebook), which is not included in the boxed edition. CONDITION: The game is in good condition, complete, with unpunched counters. The rulebook has light handling wear and the folio cover has a fair amount of creasing, although it is still serviceable. The countersheet and map are in excellent condition. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £2.75 European Postage: £4.25 Rest of World Postage: £7.25 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

This is for the Avalon Hill Storm Over Arnhem game from 1981. This is not the boxed game. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a folio edition and is in excellent condition. The glossy-finished mapsheet is 32_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and has everything the hard-backed mapboards have. The countersheet is unpunched, with 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; counters. The rulebook contains not only the rules, but an extensive historical commentary. Mapsheet, counters and booklet are in as new condition. For enthusiasts of this game, you could take this with you on your travels as well as play it at home. Please contact me for shipping costs, especially if you live outside the UK.
